Title: subDate
Description: Subtracts the time interval from the provided date, date with time or String-encoded date / date with time.
If the subtraction results in a value outside the bounds of the data type, the result is undefined.
date — The date or date with time from which interval is subtracted. Date, Date32, DateTime, DateTime64, or Stringinterval — Interval to subtract. Interval.
Date or date with time obtained by subtracting interval from date. Date, Date32, DateTime or DateTime64.
